text-node.description: This pipeline implements the billing logic. It is used by both the single shipping and the multi shipping scenario and is responsible for providing the payment method selection as well as entering a billing address.
Starting point for billing. After a successful shipping setup both COShipping and COShippingMultiple jump to this node.
Initializes all forms of the billing page including: - address form - email address - coupon form

Initializes the address form: - if customer chose option "use as billing address" on single shipping page the form is prepopulated with the shipping address, otherwise - prepopulate with already set billing address, otherwise - prepopulate with default address of authenticated customer

initializes the email address form field: - if there's already a customer email set at the basket this email address is taken, otherwise - if the current customer is authenticated the email address of the customer's profile is taken
Initializes the credit card list by determining the saved customer payment instruments of type credit card.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group
Bind stateCode to sub form group

text-node.description: If billing address is in basket then update it with the billing form.
If customer is authenticated and he has the address then look for the default address otherwise leave the billing address field blank.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Updating the credit card form with default credit card details

text-node.description: Clean shipments.

Attempts to apply a coupon code to the basket and recalculates the basket if the coupon was applied successfully. If the coupon wasn't applied, the form field is invalidated with the appropriate error message. If the coupon was applied, the form gets cleared. The start node is called by an Ajax request and generates a JSON response.

Attempts to redeem a gift certificate. If the gift certificate wasn't redeemed, the form field is invalidated with the appropriate error message. If the gift certificate was redeemed, the form gets cleared. This start node is called by an Ajax request and generates a JSON response.

Adjust gift certificate redemptions as after applying coupon(s), order total is changed. AdjustGiftCertificate pipeline removes and then adds currently added gift certificates to reflect order total changes.
Attempts to remove a gift certificate from the basket payment instruments and generates a JSON response with a status. This start node is called by an Ajax request.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group

text-node.description: Performs validation steps, based upon the entered billing address and address options.
Performs payment method specific checks, such as credit card verification.

Renders the order summary including mini cart order totals and shipment summary. This is used to update the order totals in the UI based on the recalculated basket after a coupon code has been applied.
Mark step as fulfilled.
A successful billing page will jump to the next checkout step.

Adjust gift certificate redemptions as after applying coupon(s), order total is changed. AdjustGiftCertificate pipeline removes and then adds currently added gift certificates to reflect order total changes.

Renders a form dialog to edit an address. The dialog is supposed to be opened by an Ajax request and ends in templates, which just trigger a certain JS event. The calling page of this dialog is responsible for handling these events.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group

text-node.description: Handles the selection of the payment method and performs payment method specific validation and verification upon the entered form fields.
skip the payment handling if the whole payment was made using gift cert
if the order total is 0 (in case user has product promotions etc.) then we do not need a valid payment method.
Returns information of a gift certificate including its balance as JSON response. Required to check the remaining balance.
Selects a customer credit card and returns the details of the credit card as JSON response. Required to fill credit card form with details of selected credit card.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Assign the unmasked credit card number to the credit card form
Assign the unmasked credit card number to the credit card form
Copy the email address to the basket

text-node.description: Verifies a credit card against a valid card number and expiration date and possibly invalidates invalid form fields. If the verification was successful a credit card payment instrument is created.
Reset the forms of all payment methods, except the one of the current selected payment method.
This is where additional PayPal integration would go. The current implementation simply creates a PaymentInstrument and returns 'success'.
This is where additional BillMeLaterl integration would go. The current implementation simply creates a payment method and returns 'success'.

This branch is called whenever payment condition on the billing page change, e.g. billing address country code, gift certificate redemption, coupon redemption. The applicable payment methods/cards are recalculated. Invalid payment instruments are removed.
This branch is used to revalidate existing payment instruments in later checkout steps.
Confirmation dialog to delete a selected credit card.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Assign the unmasked credit card number to the credit card form

text-node.description: Updates the Sequence Number

Attempts to save the used credit card in the customer payment instruments. The logic replaces an old saved credit card with the same masked credit card number of the same card type with the new credit card. This ensures creating only unique cards as well as replacing expired cards.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Remove the saved record of the same credit card

text-node.description: Checks if the basket has already a billing address set and creates one, if not.
Attempts to save the used billing address in the customer address book.
Clear eCheck form when user select payment method "Credit Card" because we validate Billing.xml for Credit Card.
Dont delete the continuity credit card
Validate Agree to terms and condition
Clear Credit Card form when user select payment method "eCheck" because we validate Billing.xml for eCheck.
